location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: HybridAKSNetworkSpec defines the desired state of HybridAKSNetwork

availabilityZones.description: AvailabilityZones - The list of Availability zones to use for nodes. Datacenter racks modelled as zones

count.description: Count - Number of agents to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

osSKU.description: Specifies the OS SKU used by the agent pool. The default is CBLMariner if OSType is Linux. The default is Windows2019 when OSType is Windows.

osType.description: The particular KubernetesVersion's Image's OS Type (Linux, Windows)

status.description: Defines the observed state of the agent pool

vmSize.description: VmSize - The size of the agent pool VMs.

errorMessage.description: ErrorMessage - Error messages during creation of agent pool

count.description: Count - Number of agents to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

vmSize.description: VmSize - The size of the agent pool VMs.

infraNetworkProfile.description: InfraNetworkProfile - List of infra network profiles for the provisioned cluster

vnetSubnetIds.description: Array of references to azure resource corresponding to the Network object e.g. /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.AzureStackHCI/logicalNetworks/{logicalNetworkName}

hostIP.description: Host IP address for API server

availabilityZones.description: AvailabilityZones - The list of Availability zones to use for nodes. Datacenter racks modelled as zones

controlPlaneEndpoint.description: API server endpoint for the control plane

count.description: Count - Number of agents to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

linuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

name.description: Unique name of the agent pool profile in the context of the subscription and resource group.

osSKU.description: Specifies the OS SKU used by the agent pool. The default is CBLMariner if OSType is Linux. The default is Windows2019 when OSType is Windows.

osType.description: The particular KubernetesVersion's Image's OS Type (Linux, Windows)

vmSize.description: VmSize - The size of the agent pool VMs.

publicKey.description: Onboarding public key for provisioning the Managed identity for the HybridAKS cluster.

resourceUid.description: Unique id of the parent provisioned cluster resource.

ssh.description: SSH - SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

publicKeys.description: PublicKeys - The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with Linux-based VMs. Only expect one key specified.

keyData.description: KeyData - Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

availabilityZones.description: AvailabilityZones - The list of Availability zones to use for nodes. Datacenter racks modelled as zones

count.description: Count - Number of agents to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

osSKU.description: Specifies the OS SKU used by the agent pool. The default is CBLMariner if OSType is Linux. The default is Windows2019 when OSType is Windows.

osType.description: The particular KubernetesVersion's Image's OS Type (Linux, Windows)

vmSize.description: VmSize - The size of the agent pool VMs.

loadBalancerProfile.description: LoadBalancerProfile - Profile of the cluster load balancer.

networkPolicy.description: NetworkPolicy - Network policy used for building Kubernetes network. Possible values include: 'calico', 'flannel'. Default is 'calico'

podCidr.description: PodCidr - A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign pod IPs when kubenet is used.

count.description: Count - Number of load balancer VMs. The default value is 0.

azureHybridBenefit.description: Indicates whether Azure Hybrid Benefit is opted in

agentPoolProfiles.description: The agent pools of the cluster.

cloudProviderProfile.description: The underlying cloud infra provider properties.

kubernetesVersion.description: KubernetesVersion - Version of Kubernetes specified when creating the managed cluster.

licenseProfile.description: The license profile of the provisioned cluster.

linuxProfile.description: LinuxProfile - The profile for Linux VMs in the Provisioned Cluster.

dhcpServers.description: Address of the DHCP servers associated with the network

dnsServers.description: Address of the DNS servers associated with the network

gateway.description: Address of the Gateway associated with the network

ipAddressPrefix.description: IP Address Prefix of the network

vlanID.description: VLAN Id used by the network

hci.description: Infra network profile for HCI platform

vmware.description: Infra network profile for VMware platform

mocGroup.description: Resource group in MOC(Microsoft On-premises Cloud)

mocVnetName.description: Virtual Network name in MOC(Microsoft On-premises Cloud)

segmentName.description: Name of the network segment in VSphere
